message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $80 to you, and I'm confident it will meet your needs perfectly. I'm offering it to you for $95 today. This price includes free shipping and a satisfaction guarantee. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your experience with our top-quality product.

Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the free shipping and guarantee, $95 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go.  I'm happy to pay $80 for the product. Let me know if that works for you.
